title: Social Language Learning in Technology-Enhanced Environments

context.additional_context: Companies aim to implement mobile-based language learning programs to strengthen employees' global work competencies. Learners engage in 15-20 minute daily activities, emphasizing social interaction via Web 2.0 tools

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively generate 5+ language expression patterns with peers using social networking tools for language learning on mobile platforms
Learners can identify and correct their own language usage errors 3+ times based on digital feedback
Learners can perform collaborative activities with peer learners 3+ times per week in a Web 2.0-based microlearning environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
